Name: Gold Fever
Description: News of recently found mineral riches are spreading and prospectors are flocking in. A show of force is needed to remind them who owns the area, and to get a piece of the pie of course.

Name: Survey Shuttle Crash
Description: Reports are coming of a shuttle crashing while surveying. We should send some ships over to make sure the rescue operation succeeds without a hitch.

Name: Smuggling Base
Description: Smugglers are operating from a hidden base in our area. We need to deal with them swiflty before more of their ilk arrives and undermines our economy.

Name: Cloud Scooper
Description: A large, heavily armed harvesting ship is operating within our territory, scooping up our gas. A powerful force is required to make it part with its loot and drive it out.

Name: Deep Core Miner
Description: An audacious miner has been spotted in a Crystal field within our borders. We don't want a reputation for being easy pickings so we need to take him out, as a warning to others.

Name: Pure Water
Description: Space nomads have discovered an Ice field with unusually pure water quality and are now starting to gather there in large numbers. We need to disperse them quickly before they get too numerous.

Name: Higwaymen
Description: A group of bandits are making hit-and-run attacks against traders in the area. Let's show our strength in the area to drive their operation somewhere else.

Name: Tow Service
Description: A fleet of freighters is having difficulties navigating  a dense resource field. They're willing to pay us good money to help them get through intact.

Name: Nature's Bounty
Description: A comet crashed into a resource field in the area, leaving a debris field full of goodies just waiting to be picked up. We should send in a task force to patrol the area and claim anything of value.

Name: Escort Duty
Description: Some big wig from the Lunar Colony is requesting an escort through the area. Having friends in high places never hurts, this can reap some future rewards.

Name: Scrapped
Description: We've received a transmission of a derelict freighter left for scrap in the area. Seems it broke down and it wasn't worth it to fix it. It's in our territory so we should check if it has any valuables still.

Name: Junkyard
Description: More and more people are complaining about the abundance of junk in the area. It's not glorious, but cleaning it up improves morale and there are always some valuable nuggets hidden in between.

Name: Binderburg Scout
Description: There are reports of a scout working for Binderburg operating in the area, probably snooping for relics or other valuables. Chase her away and confiscate whatever illgotten gains she has.

Name: Martian Bulk Miner
Description: The Martian Prosper League has no regards for sovereignty and sends its miners anywhere it pleases. We need to send them a strong message that we protect what is ours.

Name: Labor Transit Attack
Description: An emergency call is coming in from a transport ship full of workers. They are being attacked by an unknown assailant, seemingly uncaring about putting people at risk. Immediate help is required.

Name: Warlord Surveyor
Description: A Tianchao surveyor is mapping out celestial bodies within our borders. We should send a force to escort him out. Confiscate any valuables to send a message they should stay out.

Name: Harvest Harassment
Description: We have reports of roughians hanging around our stations, intercepting and stealing our harvested resources as they are coming in. We need to respond quickly before we lose more resources.

Name: Mining Robots
Description: An unknown entity is conducting a clandestine gas mining operation within our empire, using small, hard to detect robots to sneak in and out. A large force is needed to sweep the area clean.

Name: Lunar Artificer
Description: Some crazy Lunar scientist is sampling Crystals in our territory, and making a general nuisance of herself. She has some hi-tech gadgets, so a strong force is needed to chase her out.

Name: Squatters
Description: Squatters have taken up illegal residence in one of our Ice fields. Water is a valuable resource and we need to take a hard stance on anyone trying to steal it from us.

Name: Marooned
Description: We have picked up an emergency signal from a group of people marooned on a planet. Sending ships to aid them is the decent thing to do, and there is rescue reward involved.

Name: Surveillance Station
Description: A Child of Mars had the audacity to order a surveillance station built on one of our planets. We need to deal with it quickly before its marauders arrive on the scene.

Name: Volcanic Activity
Description: One of our moons had an abrupt volcanic activity, fissures are forming and toxic vapors coming out. Science and surveying teams are in great peril and we need to send in ships to rescue them.

Name: Anarchist Attack
Description: A rampaging Xaox fleet cannot be reasoned with. The only language they understand is force, so make sure we muster enough to make them understand.

Name: Sabotage
Description: Our operatives have uncovered a sinister plot to undermine our empire. We must act quickly and decisively before the saboteurs manage to wreak havoc in our realm.

Name: Gelecek Research Team
Description: A Gelecek Research team has wandered into our territory. They have well-equipped escorts, so make sure we send enough ships to convince them to conduct their research elsewhere.

Name: Xaoc Raider Base
Description: A group of anarchist has set up a base within our territory, preparing to send out raiding parties. They can become a thorn in our side, so send a strong force to deal with them for good.

Name: Perihelion
Description: This planet is now closest to the sun in its orbit. It is attracting scavangers of every kind and we need a strong force to disperse them.

Name: Tianchao Settler
Description: A huge Tianchao colony ship was detected close to one of our planets recently. The Tianchao have no regard for sovereignty and we need to investigate to see if they are trying to colonize.

Name: MPL Mining Base
Description: An informant of ours has revealed the location of an underground mining base operated by the nefarious MPL. The base has some decent defenses, so make sure enough ships are sent to take it out.
